price: Na atakaye mjia naye ni Muumini aliye tenda mema, basi hao ndio wenye vyeo vya juu.
arabic: وَمَن يَأۡتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنٗا قَدۡ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلۡعُلَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waman yatihi mu'minan qad ʿamila al-ṣāliḥāti fa-ulāika lahumu al-darajātu al-ʿulā
